data.title: COVID-19 reporting
data.meta_description: The COVID-19 dashboard includes data on city/town COVID-19 activity, confirmed and probable cases of COVID-19, confirmed and probable deaths related to COVID-19, and the demographic characteristics of cases and deaths.
data.text:
National data

COVID-19 Data Tracker | CDC

COVID-19 Variant Proportions | CDC

Resources

For more information on COVID-19, including symptoms and spread, testing, prevention, and treatment, visit Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19).

Data archive

If you are looking for data that are older than the data included on this page, consider looking through our COVID-19 data archive. All past reports and data sets (excel) are available for download.

COVID-19 dashboard data archive:

Archived COVID-19 reporting dashboard data (2023-2024)

Archive of COVID-19 cases in Massachusetts

Archive of COVID-19 weekly public health reports

State Facility Report: As of October 3, 2022, the COVID-19 State Facility Report has been discontinued. Access all previous state facility reports.

Please note: On December 4, 2023, the Massachusetts Legislature repealed Chapter 93 of the Acts of 2020, an emergency law that required reporting of COVID-19 testing, cases and deaths statewide and in state licensed elder facilities, intermediate care for persons with an intellectual disability, and county and state correctional facilities. The last daily Chapter 93 reports published by the Department of Public Health (DPH) reflect data from Dec. 4, 2023. DPH will publish the final monthly Elder Facility aggregate report by the end of the year that captures all cases and deaths from March 10, 2020 through December 4, 2023.

Chapter 93 Elder Facilities Daily Report - December 6, 2023 (self-reported data)

Chapter 93 State Numbers Daily Report - December 5, 2023

Chapter 93 County Correctional Facilities Daily Report - March 2, 2023

Chapter 93 County Correctional Facilities Weekly Report - March 1, 2023

Chapter 93 Elder Facility Aggregative Report Monthly Update (data from March 10, 2020 to October 31, 2023)

Department of Correction (DOC) data:

DOC Inmate Dashboard

DOC Staff Testing Reports

DOC Institution Cell Housing Reports

This data is posted in response to Chapter 93 of the Acts of 2020, and includes testing, case, and death data and relevant demographics.

Previous Chapter 93 reports: Archive of Chapter 93 COVID-19 Data.
